title: Jansson wins PFA Fans' award

organizations.name: aston villa's jonathan kodija leeds united

text:
Leeds defender Pontus Jansson wins PFA Fans' Championship Player of the Month for December Last Updated: 05/01/17 7:13am Leeds United's Pontus Jansson (left) in action against and Aston Villa's Jonathan Kodija Leeds United defender Pontus Jansson has won the PFA Fans' Championship Player of the Month award for December. 
Over 17,000 votes were cast in the poll, which was held on the Sky Sports website and apps, with Jansson finishing first with 9,294 votes. 
Brighton forward Glenn Murray came second in the poll with 2,141 votes ahead of Fulham midfielder Stefan Johansen in third with 2,002. Rounding off the top six were Huddersfield striker Nahki Wells (1,395), Derby midfielder Bradley Johnson (1,344) and Barnsley's Sam Winnall (1,145). Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Aston Villa and Leeds United 
The six candidates were chosen by our expert panel, which included Sky Sports pundits Peter Beagrie and Paul Merson, Mike Riley - general manager of the Professional Game Match Officials Board, and Malcolm Clarke, chairman of the Football Supporters' Federation. 
And it is Jansson, who has come out on top thanks to your votes, which have been verified by an independent party.
